artifacts.describe: Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: DEF +30%. | 4-piece: Within 8s of triggering Elemental Skill, gain Lifeless Blade: ATK increased by 1% per point of DEF; decreases DEF by 30% of DEF.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: HP +20%. | 4-piece: When casting Elemental Skill, nearby party members’ ATK increased by 20% and Shield Strength increased by 30% for 3s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Increases Shield Strength by 35%. | 4-piece: While protected by a shield, Normal and Charged Attack DMG increased by 40%.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: ATK +18%. | 4-piece: When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has ≥15 Energy, consumes 15 Energy to gain +50% ATK for 10s.

Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Electro DMG Bonus +15%. | 4-piece: Increases damage caused by Overload, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct by 40%, and triggers an ATK increase of 20% for 12s when these reactions are triggered.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: CRIT Rate +12%. | 4-piece: If CRIT Rate < 100%, CRIT Rate increased by 24%.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: DEF +30%. | 4-piece: Within 8s of Elemental Skill, ATK increased by 1% per point of DEF; decreases DEF by 30%.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: HP +20%. | 4-piece: Upon Elemental Skill, nearby party ATK +20% and Shield +30% for 3s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Pyro DMG +15%. | 4-piece: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40% and Vaporize/Melt DMG by 15%.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: ATK +18%. | 4-piece: Consumes 15 Energy upon Elemental Skill to gain +50% ATK for 10s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Healing Bonus +15%. | 4-piece: When Healing, gain a damage bonus equal to 20% of Healing for 10s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Hydro DMG +15%. | 4-piece: After Elemental Skill, Normal and Charged Attack DMG +30% for 15s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Electro DMG +15%. | 4-piece: Increases Overload, Electro-Charged, Superconduct DMG by 40%, and ATK +20% for 12s when triggered.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Burst DMG +20%. | 4-piece: Using Burst increases all party ATK by 20% for 12s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Burst DMG +20%. | 4-piece: Burst increases party ATK by 20% for 12s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: ATK +18%. | 4-piece: If using a Sword, Claymore, or Polearm, increases Normal Attack DMG by 35%.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Cryo DMG +15%. | 4-piece: CRIT Rate +20%; if opponent Frozen, +20% more.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Healing +15%. | 4-piece: Using Elemental Skill or Burst increases Healing Received by all party members by 20% for 10s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Dendro DMG +15%. | 4-piece: Decreases opponent Dendro RES by 30% for 8s.
Max Rarity: 4 | 2-piece: Increases Elemental Mastery by 80. | 4-piece: After using Elemental Skill, increases all party Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Cryo DMG +15%. | 4-piece: CRIT Rate +20%; if opponent Frozen, +20% more.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Elemental Burst DMG +20%. | 4-piece: Using Elemental Burst grants party ATK +20% for 12s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Pyro DMG +15%. | 4-piece: Overloaded/Burning DMG +40%; Vaporize/Melt DMG +15%.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Pyro RES +40%. | 4-piece: DMG against Pyro-affected enemies +35%.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Burst DMG +20%. | 4-piece: Burst grants party ATK +20% for 12s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Healing +15%. | 4-piece: Skill/Burst increases Healing Received by party +20% for 10s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Physical DMG +25%. | 4-piece: After Elemental Skill, ATK +9% for 7s; stacks 2 times.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: HP +20%. | 4-piece: On Elemental Skill, party ATK +20% and Shield +30% for 3s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Electro DMG +15%. | 4-piece: Overload/Electro-Charged/Superconduct DMG +40%, ATK +20% for 12s when triggered.
Max Rarity: 4 | 2-piece: Elemental Mastery +80. | 4-piece: After Elemental Skill, party Elemental Mastery +120 for 8s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Cryo DMG +15%. | 4-piece: CRIT Rate +20%; additional +20% if Frozen.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Elemental Mastery +80. | 4-piece: Charged Attack DMG +35% if using Catalyst or Bow.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Pyro DMG +15%. | 4-piece: Overloaded/Burning DMG +40%; Vaporize/Melt DMG +15%.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: ATK +18%. | 4-piece: When casting Elemental Skill, if the character has ≥15 Energy, consumes 15 Energy to gain +50% ATK for 10s.

Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Burst DMG +20%. | 4-piece: Using Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s.

Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Healing Bonus +15%. | 4-piece: When Healing, gain a DMG bonus equal to 20% of the Healing amount for 10s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Healing +15%. | 4-piece: Skill/Burst increases Healing Received by party by 20% for 10s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Electro DMG +15%. | 4-piece: Increases Overload, Electro-Charged and Superconduct DMG by 40%, and triggers an ATK increase of 20% for 12s when these reactions are triggered.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Elemental Burst DMG +20%. | 4-piece: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Energy Recharge +20%. | 4-piece: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Elemental Burst DMG +20%. | 4-piece: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: Geo DMG +15%. | 4-piece: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize reaction, all party members gain all elemental DMG bonus by 35% for 10s.
Max Rarity: 5 | 2-piece: HP +20%. | 4-piece: When Elemental Skill hits an opponent, increases ATK by 20% and Shield Strength by 30% for 3s.
